Class BankAccountSelector

public inherited sharing class BankAccountSelector

Changes

08/09/2021 Initial version. 08/10/2021 Adds method getBankAccountById() and several fields to getBankAccountByCode(). 08/24/2021 Adds method getBankAccountByExternalId(). 08/29/2021 Adds additional fields to method getBankAccountById(). 08/30/2021 New methods getBankAccountsByType() and getBankAccountsByVenue(). 10/25/2023 getBankAccountByExternalId(): adds field MainContact__c.
